title: DJ Sessions: Women And The Future Of Music
teaser: Kentucky DJ Kyle Meredith shares a playlist highlighting female artists who have been pushing the music industry forward.
contentencoded:
For this week’s DJ Sessions, we speak with Kyle Meredith who hosts “The Weekly Feed” out of WFPK in Louisville, Ky. He’s also music director there, and joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to talk about female musicians that are driving the future of music.

  • Hear more DJ Sessions

Songs From The Segment

Tune-Yards, “Water Fountain”

[Youtube]

My Brightest Diamond, “Pressure”

[Youtube]

St. Vincent, “This is Birth in Reverse”

[Youtube]

Janelle Mon√°e, “Q.U.E.E.N.” featuring Erykah Badu

[Youtube]

Sleater-Kinney, “The Song is Bury our Friends”

[Youtube]

Joan Shelley, “Something Small”

Guest:

  • Kyle Meredith music director who hosts “The Weekly Feed” out of WFPK in Louisville, Ky. He tweets @kylemeredith.
